"1. GPS returns to the take-off point with one click, low battery return, no signal return.
2. ①GPS smart follow: follow the phone to fly;
②Image follow: identify the subject and follow the subject to fly 360 degrees around.
3. Gesture shooting recognition: within 1-3m away from the aircraft, face the camera to make a photo/video gesture.
4. Route multi-point planning flight: the aircraft flies autonomously according to the pre-set route, and the player focuses on shooting.
5. Fixed-point surround: find the center point of the surround, and then move the desired surround radius through the joystick.
6. Intelligent functions: one-click long-distance flight, one-click skyward, one-click spiral, vertical screen aerial photography, time-lapse photography, panoramic photography.
7. Aircraft recovery function:
Open the APP---Settings---Trajectory---Find aircraft, enter the map interface, and the map shows the aircraft's last distance, longitude and latitude.
8. Picture and video sharing: You can select single or multiple photos to share, and videos can only be shared one at a time.
9. HD wide angle 100°, adjustable camera 80°.
10. 11.1V plug-in smart lithium battery, ultra-long battery life. "

title: GKA Li-Ion Liion Battery batre 6S 6S3P 22.2V 9000mAh Drone FPV 100A
description: PERHATIAN, MOHON DIBACA TERLEBIH DAHULU YA.... Pengiriman hanya bisa menggunakan JNE Harga yang tertera adalah Harga resmi yang sudah ditambah biaya tambahan Tokopedia sebesar 8% Pengiriman Battery bisa mengguanakn JNE (Semua servis) ke seluruh wilayah Indonesia, Untuk JNE YES bisa juga tapi kebanyakan tidak lulus XRay dan otomatis akan dialihkan lewat darat (waktu pengiriman lebih lama), Tapi terkadang saat tidak lulus XRay, besok nya bisa sampai juga ke kota tujuan (nah ini saya kurang tau kenapa bisa begini). Jadi mohon pengertiannya untuk pengiriman battery memang lebih lama dari biasanya. Jadilah pembeli yang bijak, mohon kesabarannya karena batre tidak seperti barang biasa untuk pengirimannya, jika perlu URGENT, harap komunikasikan ke kami terlebih dahulu. Kenapa GKA Battery? *) Menggunakan Battery BARU dan berkualitas (ORIGINAL/AUTHENTIC BATTERY) *) Menggunakan kabel Full silicone baik discharge maupun balance port *) Battery Fresh Rakitan (bukan stok lama yang disimpan) *) DI SOLDER bukan pakai spot weld, jadi arus dijamin mantab, tidak korosi, dan sambungan dijamin awet *) Battery PASTI di test sebelum dikirim, untuk memastikan kualitas *) Bisa Request Konektor (silahkan PM untuk ketersediaan konektor yang di inginkan) *) Bisa Request kapasitas (silahkan PM jika membutuhkan kapasitas dan voltase batery yang diperlukan) Spesifikasi: Type Battery: LiIon Konfigurasi: 6S3P Kapasitas: 7.800mAh/9.000mAh/10.200mAh Voltase: 22.2V Berat: Approx 900gr Dimensi: 55x109x75mm (Kotak), 55x55x145mm (memanjang) Cable amp; Connector: 12AWG XT60 Continues Discharge: 75A/60A/45A Burst discharge: 120A/100A/85A Charging Current: under 6A Untuk Warna Wrap default Hitam, tapi tidak menutup kemungkinan warna lain FAQ: Q: Charging pakai mode apa ya? A: Charging pakai mode LiPo 4.20V ya kak. Q: Kog 4.20V, Bukannya 4.10V ya buat Liion A: Untuk Battery Liion saat ini (yang saya pakai) Full nya memang 4.20V kak, beda dengan Liion jaman dahulu yang hanya 4.10V, bahkan ada juga liion yang sampai 4.35V Q: Untuk Storage nya bagaimana ya? A: Storage sama seperti LiPo, bisa di range 3.6-3.9V. Q:Landing (habis) di berapa volt ya? A: Untuk LiIon Habisnya di 2.8V/Cell ya kak, untuk landing volltage nanti tergantung load nya, tapi biasanya antara 3.1-2.9V/cell

title: [READY STOK] DJI O4 Pro Lite Air Unit FPV Drone Video System
description:
Summary
The DJI O4 Air Unit redefines video transmission with improved resolution, lower latency, and extended range. At just 8.2 grams, it integrates a 1/2-inch image sensor that records 4K/60fps video, delivering an ideal combination of performance and portability.

Features
Works with DJI Goggles 2, DJI Goggles Integra, DJI Goggles 3, or DJI Goggles N3
Compatible with DJI FPV Remote Controller 2 or 3
Lightweight FHD FPV Digital Video Transmission
20 ms Low Latency, 10 km Range
1/2-inch CMOS Image Sensor
4K/60fps Video Recording
1080p/100fps Live View
8.2g Lightweight Body

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN
The DJI O4 Air Unit can fit drone frames of 2 inches and smaller, supporting flexible assembly to suit various creative flight scenarios. Experience the thrill of flying while capturing high-quality footage with ease.

VISUALLY STRIKING
The DJI O4 Air Unit Series is capable of recording 4K/60fps video. The video transmission system utilizes H.265 video encoding, supporting high-frame-rate transmission at 1080p/100fps, ensuring clear and smooth real-time imagery. No matter how fast you fly, the camera view keeps up.

RACING MODE
The DJI O4 introduces a new Racing mode, with video transmission latency as low as 20 milliseconds. It supports up to eight aircraft racing simultaneously, taking you on an exhilarating, high-speed journey through the skies.

CANVAS MODE
The DJI O4 Air Unit supports Canvas Mode and Betaflight OSD settings. You can customize the real-time data and layout displayed on your goggles screen, making flight data clear at a glance and enhancing your control precision.

Specifications
